Key Match Events: Kyle Schwarber hit a leadoff home run for Philadelphia
Kody Clemens's two-run homer lifted the Philadelphia Phillies to a 4-2 win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bowden Francis was named the American League's pitcher of the month before the game
Others: Brendon Little, Tommy Nance and Ryan Burr came on in relief of Francis
J.T. Realmuto added a home run in the ninth inning
